OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Prior receive condition chemotherapy regimen , patient acute leukemia , chronic myelogenous leukemia ( CML ) , high-risk myelodysplastic syndrome ( chronic myelomonocytic leukemia , atypical CML , refractory anemia excess blast ) receive one dose intrathecal ( IT ) methotrexate .
